abstract: Lawyer for New Jersey Transit engineer Thomas Gallagher says his client has previously undiagnosed sleep apnea, which could help explain why Gallagher has no memory of Sept 29 crash in Hoboken Terminal.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Gallagher, the engineer of the New Jersey Transit train that slammed into the station, killing one and injuring more than 100, believed the diagnosis might explain what happened.
snippet: Thomas Gallagher, the engineer of the New Jersey Transit train that slammed into the station, killing one and injuring more than 100, believed the diagnosis might explain what happened....

headline.main: Engineer in Hoboken Train Crash Had Undiagnosed Sleep Disorder, Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Engineer Has Sleep Apnea, Lawyer Says
